ROM.Changelog: - Merge AOSP upstream (r17) including latest June security patches - Merge CAF LA.BF64 upstream into bluetooth repos - Remove dynamic navbar colors (as many have requested) - One hand mode for hardware keys (use hw key rebinding) - Add dashboard summary to SystemUI Tuner - Reduce turn off delay for button backlight when turning off the screen - Improve battery life - Update halogenOS keyboard - Some cleanup in the build system - Miscellaneous changes including bugfixes and improvements
